sent.orig: Your inquiry has been sent. Our customer representative will address your inquiry shortly.
sent.trans: 你的查询已被送出，我们的客户服务代表会尽快处理有关提问。

sent.orig: The drug will recruit his health shortly.
sent.trans: 这药会让他很快恢复健康。

sent.orig: The panel will adjourn in March to avoid influencing unduly the general election expected shortly thereafter.
sent.trans: 布朗将在夏天接受调查。

sent.orig: People gather outside on a street in Beijing, China, shortly after Monday's earthquake.
sent.trans: 在中国北京，人们在周一地震之后聚集在户外的街道上。

sent.orig: The revelry started shortly after night fell and lasted until midnight.
sent.trans: 夜幕刚刚降临欢庆活动便开始了，热闹的场面一直持续到了午夜。
